DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.CurveId, T1.GroupingId, T1.CurveDescription, T5.value Dimension, T1.Expiries, T7.id FXSpotID, T8.id FXForeignCurveID, T9.id FXDomesticCurveID FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationFXVolatilities T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesDimensionType T5 ON T1.Dimension = T5.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs T7 ON T1.FXSpotID = T7.id LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs T8 ON T1.FXForeignCurveID = T8.id LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs T9 ON T1.FXDomesticCurveID = T9.id

field.name: Dimension
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Dimension,!T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesDimensionType !T! ORDER BY !T!.value

field.name: FXSpotID
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.id FXSpotID,!T!.id FROM ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs !T! ORDER BY !T!.id

field.name: FXForeignCurveID
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.id FXForeignCurveID,!T!.id FROM ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs !T! ORDER BY !T!.id

field.name: FXDomesticCurveID
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.id FXDomesticCurveID,!T!.id FROM ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs !T! ORDER BY !T!.id
